name: test-fix
description: Diagnose and fix failing pytest tests in the pplx-sdk project, following existing test patterns and conventions.

test_path.description: Path to the failing test file or specific test function

error_output.description: The pytest error output or traceback

outputs.diagnosis: Root cause analysis of the test failure
outputs.fix: Code changes applied to resolve the failure
outputs.verification: Test run results after the fix

prompt: Diagnose and fix the failing test. Run the test with pytest -v to capture the traceback. Trace the code path from test to source to identify the root cause. Preserve test intent â€” never weaken assertions to make tests pass. Use pytest-httpx for HTTP mocking, pytest-asyncio for async tests. Test: {{test_path}}
